DOC.detailed_description: The National Pregnancy Registry Atypical Antipsychotics dedicate evaluate safety atypical antipsychotic medication may take woman pregnancy treat wide range mood , anxiety , psychiatric disorder . The primary goal Registry determine frequency major malformation , heart defect , cleft lip , neural tube defect , infant expose atypical antipsychotic pregnancy . We currently study follow medication : - Abilify ( aripiprazole ) - Aristada ( aripiprazole lauroxil ) - Clozaril ( clozapine ) - Fanapt ( iloperidone ) - Geodon ( ziprasidone ) - Invega ( paliperidone ) - Latuda ( lurasidone ) - Rexulti ( brexpiprazole ) - Risperdal ( risperidone ) - Saphris ( asenapine ) - Seroquel ( quetiapine ) - Zyprexa ( olanzapine )
